Question: Following Marshall's death, this person began a lengthy legal battle over a share of his estate.
Hints: This person died on February 8, 2007 in a Hollywood, Florida hotel room as a result of an overdose of prescription drugs.
A petition to probate this person's will was filed in Los Angeles County Superior Court.
After months of waiting, this person and her stepson Pierce learned of the Supreme Court's decision on May 1, 2006.
